query:
UPDATE timed_tasks_queue
                SET locked_by = ?1
                WHERE task_kind = (
                    SELECT task_kind
                    FROM timed_tasks_queue
                    WHERE
                        (locked_by IS NULL OR locked_by != ?1)
                        AND due_at <= ?2
                    ORDER BY due_at ASC
                    LIMIT 1
                )
                RETURNING task_kind AS "task_kind: TaskKind"
